title: unable to connect to authentication service
body:
As the title says. Can't seem to log in. Any fixes for this issue? I've restarted PC, used Hextech repair, repatched, ran as admin. nothing is working. 

Thanks!

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection is having issues specifically reaching the authentication server, maybe a firewall or antivirus setting.  A reinstall wouldn't really help there, but auto-configuring firewall settings through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) may do the trick.

Should that fail, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to help rule out some more possibilities.

i used the guide, did all the steps. using command prompt, flushed dns, changed network settings, updated drivers, restarted computer, even turned firewall off. still nothing. nothing has changed since the last time i played league, i dont understand why this would be happening.

Ugh, it's a bummer to hear the steps didn't help here.  :(  In that case, grab the logs provided by the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be able to check those out and find some more options with you directly.
well, tried to disable firewall(using repair tool), still didnt work.
